Text.Page:
When the argons hit us, we took heavy casualties. We don't have the resources to ship back bodies, but if we could return the horns of the fallen to their families, it would do them great honor.

You're a soldierâ€”you understand, right? Four slain blacksmiths still lie on the field of battle. Recover their horns for me.
(This blacksmith gave his life fighting off the argons.)
(This blacksmith gave his life fighting off the argons.)
(This blacksmith gave his life fighting off the argons.)
(This blacksmith gave his life fighting off the argons.)
Thank you. Their families will be grateful, too.
